description: Creates the specified credential for use with external data sources in the specified database.

parameters.description: The parameters required to create the credential (name and password)

uri.description: the URI identifier for the data source this credential can connect to in the format :

userid.description: the object identifier for the user associated with this credential with access to the data source.

password.description: the password for the credential and user with access to the data source.

database_name.description: The name of the database in which to create the credential. Note: This is NOT an external database name, but the name of an existing U-SQL database that should contain the new credential object.
